00021 /// Configuration macro used to specify the platform: Windows or Linux. 
00022 #define PLATFORM(x) PLATFORM_ ## x
00023 
00024 /// Generic status codes for success or error.
00025 enum
00026 {
00027    ST_OK ,     ///< the generic OK value
00028    ST_ERROR    ///< the generic ERROR value
00029 };
00030 
00031 /// Logical values.
00032 enum
00033 {
00034    ST_FALSE ,  ///< the logical FALSE value
00035    ST_TRUE     ///< the logical TRUE value 
00036 };
00037 
00038 /// A kind of logical values.
00039 enum
00040 {
00041    ST_NO,   ///< a kind of logical FALSE value
00042    ST_YES   ///< a kind of logical true value
00043 };
00044 
00045 #ifndef __cplusplus
00046 // assumes it does no harm...
00047 typedef unsigned int bool; ///< For compatibility with C++ 
00048 
00049 /// Fake C++ logical values
00050 enum { false, true };
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 typedef const char cchar;      ///< const char abbreviation
00054 typedef unsigned char uchar;   ///< unsigned char abbreviation
00055 typedef unsigned int uint;     ///< unsigned int abbreviation
00056 typedef unsigned long ulong;   ///< unsigned long abbreviation
00057 typedef unsigned short ushort; ///< unsigned short abbreviation

00064

00066 #define IF_LINUX(x)
00067 
00068 // // enlarges the maximum number of sockets in type fd_set
00069 // (not needed for client application)

00072 // needed for functions exported from a dll

00074 #define TC2API __declspec(dllexport)
00075 #else

00077 #endif
